basics.name: Guillaume Duveau
basics.label: Architect, expert and lead developer in Blockchain & Web projects
basics.summary: After 17 years as a web expert developer, those last years I acquired an extensive experience into blockchain development

work.position: Architect, expert and lead developer in Blockchain & Web projects
highlights: Indirect clients: [Pierre Fabre group](https://www.pierre-fabre.com) ([Klorane](https://www.klorane.com/), [Ducray](https://www.ducray.com)), various confidential major french compagnies.

work.position: Architect, expert and lead developer in Blockchain & Web projects
work.summary: My work at Talao involved technical architecture conception, technical lead of small teams (up to 3 developers), and dApps (decentralized applications) development with: Ethereum blockchain smartcontracts in Solidity, Truffle tests, connectivity with Web3 version 1 with Metamask, interfaces with React and Material UI. I also integrated other techs like Node, MySQL, and standards like like MIT's Blockcerts.org.
highlights: Architecture conception, technical lead and main developer of the upcoming Talao Certified Experience. It's a hybrid decentralized & centralized platform based on the interconnection of: Ethereum smart contracts, a Node.js/MySQL backend, 2 React interfaces.
Design and development of Talao's smart contracts, built on Ethereum's standards for Identity and Claims management (ERC 725 / ERC 735)
Took part of the Initial coin offering (ICO) and the Know your customer (KYC)
First Ethereum technologies tests at Talao and development of an early DAO prototype

Quality assurance editing and review system for the [Climate data store](https://cds.climate.copernicus.eu/) (CDS) of the [European Centre for Medium-Range Weather Forecasts](https://www.ecmwf.int/) (ECMWF).

work.summary: From 2004 to 2016, I was web developer at the french national institute for Earth sciences and Astronomy (CNRS-INSU).
highlights: I was also Drupal expert for CNRS on other projects like CNRSnews.fr
And web expert in numerous CNRS professional committees for recruitment and internal careers
